path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Iosiro/dHEDGE Synthetix V3 Integration Smart Contract Audit _ iosiro.md

findings.title: Transferring an Account NFT to the pool before one is created results in temporary DoS
findings.description: Attempts to execute createAccount() or createAccount(uint128) will revert if an Account NFT is transferred using transferFrom() to the pool before either create is called, causing a temporary denial of service.
